post.title: Overreacted - Personal blog by Dan Abramov
post.description: Checkout Dan Abramovs new personal blog - Overreacted
post.content: I have some great news for everyone interested in the internals of React and JavaScript in general! Dan Abramov, one of the software engineers behind ReactJS, started his own personal blog since the end of November. Ever wondered, how React can tell the difference between a Class from a Function? Or how setState knows what it should do? Then definitely check out his posts on Overreacted and follow him on Twitter!
